[DQR.IFRS.0102.9541] Velat with a value of 1,219,100,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Liabilities and Noncurrent Liabilites ( 874,900,000 + 326,900,000 ) with a value of 1,201,800,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Liabilities fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Liabilities : -5 Decimals of Current Liabilities : -5 Decimals of Non Current Liabilities : -5

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept stocka:CashAndCashEquivalentsIncludingChequeAccountWithOverdraftFacility of 152,300,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 213,700,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of stocka:CashAndCashEquivalentsIncludingChequeAccountWithOverdraftFacility that should add to 152,300,000 are comprised of the following:
+ CashAndCashEquivalents 213,700,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : stocka:CashAndCashEquivalentsIncludingChequeAccountWithOverdraftFacility Total Value : 152,300,000 Total period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -5 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700IFQI6W89M1IY95/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/stocka-2021-12-31.zip/stocka-2021-12-31/reports/stocka-2021-12-31.html 14162

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 1,200,000 reported in the network role http://www.stockmann.com/2021-12-31/xbrl/role/StatementFinancialPositionCurrentNonCurrent should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 100,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000_extended. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of OtherReserves : -5 Decimals of Equity : -5 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700IFQI6W89M1IY95/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/stocka-2021-12-31.zip/stocka-2021-12-31/reports/stocka-2021-12-31.html 14141

The properties of this ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
